buyer_id,
trade_no,
notify_time,
subject,
sign_type,
notify_type,
out_trade_no,

update_time,
platform_id,
total_amount,
receipt_amount,
) VALUES (
#{buyerId},
#{tradeNo},
#{notifyTime},
#{subject},
#{signType},
#{notifyType},
#{outTradeNo},
#{gmtPayment},
#{tradeStatus},
#{sign},
#{gmtCreate},
#{sellerId},
#{sellerEmail},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
#{platformId},
#{totalAmount},
#{receiptAmount},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE p_pay_ali_log
buyer_id = #{buyerId},
trade_no = #{tradeNo},
notify_time = #{notifyTime},
subject = #{subject},
sign_type = #{signType},
notify_type = #{notifyType},
out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo},
gmt_payment = #{gmtPayment},
trade_status = #{tradeStatus},
sign = #{sign},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
seller_id = #{sellerId},
seller_email = #{sellerEmail},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
total_amount=#{totalAmount},
receipt_amount=#{receiptAmount},
WHERE id = #{id}
